(bei mehreren Besch\u00e4ftigungen Angab: (in case of several occupations, information can be supplied on separate sheet)
Angaben f\u00fcr ein vollj\u00e4hriges K: Information concerning child of age or nearly 18,
Angaben zur Erwerbst\u00e4tigkeit eines: Information about the employment of a child of age (only in case of entries between a) and d))
Reason for deviating address (e.g. staying with grandparents/at a foster home/at a accomodation due to school education or apprenticeship)
Haben Sie oder eine andere Person bei ei: Have you or another person applied for or received child benefit for the child at/from another Family Benefits Office?
Insgesamt (vereinbarte) regelm\u00e4\u00: Overall (agreed upon) regular weekly working hours...hours
Kindschaftsverh\u00e4ltnis zu anderen Pe: Relationship of child to other persons:
Kindschaftsverh\u00e4ltnis zur antragste: Relationship of child to applicant, to spouse and other persons
Nachweise zu den Angaben f\u00fcr ein vo: Supporting documents concerning the statements for the child of full age:
Name und Vorname der antragstellenden Pe: Surname and first name of applicant
Name, Vorname der beziehenden Person: Surname, first name of the recipient
Name, Vorname des Besch\u00e4ftigten: Surname, first name of the employee
Name/Bezeichnung des Dienstherrn/Arbeitg: Name/Designation of employer (personnel number, if applicable)/company/agency/institution
Sind oder waren Sie oder eine andere Per: Did you or another person related to the child – during the last five years prior to the application –
Wenn ja, bitte hier Angaben machen:: If so, please provide details here:
befindet sich in einer \u00dcbergangszei: is in a transitional phase of four months at most (e.g. between two stages of training)
ggf. abweichende Anschrift (bei Wohnort: Address if deviating (if residence abroad please name the country)
in Deutschland auf Veranlassung eines Ar: work in Germany as instructed by an employer with registered office outside of Germany
ist ohne Besch\u00e4ftigung und bei eine: is without employment and registered as job seeking at a national job center (Agentur für Arbeit)
ist wegen einer vor Vollendung des 25. L: is due to a handicap, which has occured under the age of 25, incapable of supporting him/herself financially
kann eine Berufsausbildung mangels Ausbi: can't begin or continue a job training for lack of an apprenticeship training position
zum Antrag auf Kindergeld vom: regarding the application for child benefit of
